title: Machine Learning + Design
description: A collection of 90+ resources for the intersection of design, user experience, machine learning and artificial intelligence including articles, books, guidelines and tools to experiment.

title: E-commerce project UX checklist
description: The checklist of UX best practices for e-commerce projects. Overall 55 guidelines divided into 9 sections, including homepage, product list, checkout, and mobile. Each guideline has an example of successful implementation and a link to the corresponding article.
